alert.note: Alert for Clay; Harlan; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Harlan, Leslie, southwestern Letcher, southeastern Perry, southwestern Knott and southeastern Clay Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Vicco to near Hoskinston to Hima. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Vicco, Causey, Sassafras, Chappell, Wiscoal, Anco, Cutshin, Cornettsville, Cinda and Asher around 405 PM EDT. Gander, Carcassonne, Arminta, Napier, Red Star, Bluefield, Big Fork, Ulvah, Yeaddiss and Peabody around 410 PM EDT. Letcher, Blackey, Indian Bottom, David, Elko, Big Laurel, Carbon Glow, Jeremiah, Roxana and Hot Spot around 415 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Harlan; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Perry
